description.value:
Effect: Choose one of the following benefits:

  • I Know How to Talk to These People:

    You gain an edge on Presence tests made to interact with royals, nobles, and their feudal followers, provided they are aware of your noble rank.

  • Noble Splendor:

    You earn 1 Renown and 1 Wealth.

  • Retinue:

    The number of followers you can recruit increases by two.

Special: If you take this title, you might occasionally be called upon to perform duties for the person who granted your noble rank.

system.story: Technically, Iâ€™m called Lord Morninghill these days. I did a little favor for Duke Kenway at the Battle of Black Forest.

prerequisites.value: A monarch or important noble grants you a noble rank.
